entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ivujivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:18 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:24 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
